attributes.long-description:
We are proudly presents Furmins and StarDrone Extreme in a single bundle only on PlayStation®Vita system:
Furmins is a unique blend of physics based set-up-and-go puzzle gameplay and real-time interactions.
StarDrone Extreme is a high-speed action thriller with a mix of arcade action, pinball, breakout, physics and collect-the-objects.


Furmins and StarDrone Extreme compatible with PS Vita system only.
StarDrone is compatible with PS3 System and supports PS Move motion controller.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems and 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.

©2013-14 Beatshapers Ltd. Developed and Published by Beatshapers Ltd. under license.
©Furmins is made by Housemarque the multiple awards winning developer of Resogun and Super Stardust HD.
©StarDrone created by Beatshapers and Orb Games Limited.
All Rights Reserved.
PlayStation®Move features require PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye (sold separately).
attributes.name: Furmins + StarDrone Extreme Bundle
